ygData.subject: Re: Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually liked throwing, the shrukiens and throwing knives are about 1 sp each, and they re really good for picking stuff out of a mob, like that gnoll that
ygData.messageBody:
I actually liked throwing, the shrukiens and throwing knives are about 1 sp each, and they're really good for picking stuff out of a mob, like that gnoll that looks like he has a
cracked staff ; ) But throwing can do about 5 damage with throwing knives (That was my highest at level 9...), and it's good for stuff that is moving quickly...Like trains and
stuff...Just make sure there isn't an elite gnoll commander between you and your target, or a guard ; )


On Sat, 3 Jul 1999 11:43:11 +0200, Jacob Jensen wrote:
>From: Jacob Jensen <jacob@...>
>
>
>> I am a level 7 monk and i have 20 points to spend. Would you recommend i spend them on offensive skills now, save them for later, use them on a skill to make money, or
use them on throwing. If on
>> throwing is it a really good skill to get, does it do any damage or is it just to attract animals as ive heard. Thanks for your time.
>
>> -Krazer, Level 7 Monk, Tunare
>
>No matter what, dont use them on offensive skills. Your skills will
>max out at each level as you use them. Waste of points. I've found
>Throwing to be a useless skill as well, only using it rarely to lure.
>
